attributes.action: officially change the word Chairman to Churman.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the word Chairman to be changed to Churman as this is how it should be spelt and pronounced. This is how i say and spell it. After research i have done it has been proved that this is the original spelling and should be pronounced Chur-Man. Due to years of mis-spelling and mis-pronounciation it is now accepted as Chairman. Please sign up and lets get this disgrace to the English language changed.

rejection.details: Your petition does not relate to Government policy.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
